segments.text: Sally , you look so corporate ! What interview do you have today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Amalgamated Trading Company . It's Swiss . Don't you think working at a foreign company would be glamorous ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I guess so . I've never actually heard of this one , but ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's small , but it's a young , dynamic , rapidly-growing company with a progressive , humanistic philosophy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You didn't read their brochure or anything , did you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Four times . I'm totally prepared . Oh , no ! I forgot to take off my nail polish ! And I have to be there in 15 minutes ! That's it . I blew it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , they are progressive and humanistic-maybe they don't care about nail polish ... uh ... even blue nail polish . Just keep your confidence up and you'll do great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But the competition is fierce this year ... and it seems like I'm the only one left who hasn't found a job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not quite the only one . I really wanted that job at the magazine , but I still haven't heard from them .
segments.speaker: S1
